definition: the 24 solar terms, calculated from the position of the sun on the ecliptic, that divide the year into 24 equal periods
regardless of the consequences/recklessly relying on a hopelessly optimistic forecast
pinyin: bu4 guan3 san1 qi1 er4 shi2 yi1

definition: the Twenty-Four Histories (25 or 26 in modern editions), collection of books on Chinese dynastic history from 3000 BC till 17th century/fig. a long and complicated story
twenty four dynastic histories (or 25 or 26 in modern editions)
It's a long and intricate story, I hardly know where to start.
pinyin: yi1 bu4 er4 shi2 si4 shi3 , bu4 zhi1 cong2 he2 shuo1 qi3
containing_words.word: 一部二十四史，不知從何說起

definition: three sevens are twenty-one (idiom)/the facts of the matter/the actual situation
the Twenty-four Filial Exemplars, classic Confucian text on filial piety from Yuan dynasty
The Strange State of the World Witnessed Over 20 Years, novel by late Qing novelist Wu Jianren 吳趼人|吴趼人[Wu2 Jian3 ren2]
pinyin: Er4 shi2 Nian2 Mu4 du3 zhi1 Guai4 Xian4 zhuang4

sentences.english: Mei Lanfang is one of the greatest artor in China in 20th centry.
sentences.chinese: 梅蘭芳是一個在第二十世紀在中國最大的阿託。

sentences.english: I was busy but miserable at twenty.
sentences.chinese: 我的二十歲是繁忙併且痛苦的。

sentences.english: Bourgeois houses only began to spring up there twenty-five years later.
sentences.chinese: 有錢人家的房屋直到二十五年前纔開始在這裏出現。

sentences.english: The twenty-seventh is my birthday, I plan to put up a marquee and throw a party .
sentences.chinese: 二十七是我的生日，我還要搭個棚呢，請請客。

sentences.english: I prefer some sort of oversizedr level. preferstomair-conhly the twentieth floor or higher.
sentences.chinese: 我嗜好較高層的，最好是二十樓或以上。

sentences.english: No fishing is allowed within twenty-mile limit.
sentences.chinese: 二十英里範圍內不準釣魚。

sentences.english: For 26 years, I worked for a major corporation in Toronto, Ontario.
sentences.chinese: 我在安大略省多倫多市一家大公司工作了二十六年。

sentences.english: Twenty years ago roughly ten boys were arrested for assault for every one girl.
sentences.chinese: 二十年前，只有大約十個男孩因毆打一個女孩被逮捕。

sentences.english: Article 21 A villagers' assembly is composed of villagers at or above the age of 18 in the village.
sentences.chinese: 第二十一條村民會議由本村十八週歲以上的村民組成。

sentences.english: Being in Cryo for 5 years, 9 months and 22 days.
sentences.chinese: 在飛行艙裏五年九個月二十二天。

sentences.english: Then the price of oil began a nearly two-decade slide.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，石油價格開始了近二十年的下滑。

sentences.english: Chinese Hamsters were introduced into the UK pet market in the 1960s.
sentences.chinese: 二十世紀六十年代被引進到英國寵物市場。

sentences.english: To provide round-the-clock technical support and maintenance services.
sentences.chinese: 公司提供技術支持及二十四小時的維修服務。

sentences.english: Let me think about that for a decade or two.
sentences.chinese: 對於這個問題，讓我再考慮一二十年吧。

sentences.english: He has been the head janitor in our school for ten years.
sentences.chinese: 他在我們學校當了二十年的清潔員工頭。

sentences.english: It cost two billion dollars to build this building.
sentences.chinese: 蓋這大樓花了二十億元。
